Package org.jsfml.window

Interface WindowStyle

All Known Implementing Classes:
RenderWindow, Window, Window
public interface WindowStyle
Provides window style constants.

These constants can be combined using an arithmetic OR operation to define the style settings for a Window. For instance, the DEFAULT style is defined as TITLEBAR | RESIZE | CLOSE.

See Also:
  • Window.create(VideoMode, String, int)

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    CLOSE
    Adds a close button to the window.
    static final int
    DEFAULT
    The default style, a resizable and closeable window with a title bar.
    static final int
    FULLSCREEN
    Makes the window a fullscreen window.
    static final int
    NONE
    Undecorated, non-resizable window.
    static final int
    RESIZE
    Makes the window resizable.
    static final int
    TITLEBAR
    Adds a title bar and a fixed border to the window.
